name: [LD49] Why Can't I Hold All These Items?
name_original: [LD49] Why Can't I Hold All These Items?
description:
Scavenge a ruined city for items of a bygone age, but you’ll have to be careful how you store them, a lot of them are very unstable!

Carefully organise your inventory, balancing the risk of carrying more valuable but unstable items to fill your contracts, upgrade your gear, and climb the scrapper ladder!

WASD/Arrows to Move, Space/Enter opens your inventory, interact with items/reorganise your inventory with the mouse.
